section-discord-intro: Discord is a popular platform for communities that supports text, voice, and video chats. My bot automates tasks on Discord servers, makes event organization easier, and supports multilingual communication, saving community managers time and keeping everything organized.

section-core-features-text: Custom-built Discord bot with event templates, translations, and admin features. Supports live and test systems, automates community management, and simplifies moderation â€“ used by over 140 users.
section-technical-architecture-text: The bot runs on Python and uses the Discord API via slash commands and buttons. Deployment is done in Docker containers on Linux systems. Templates and modular structures enable flexible event organization and clear administration.
section-challenges-text: Implementing a scalable event system with test and live environments, multilingual support, template logic, and admin features required complex data structures and command handling.
section-conclusion-outlook-text: The bot is already used by over 140 users and greatly simplifies daily community management. Development is active, and the following features are on the roadmap:
section-conclusion-outlook-text2: The goal is to continuously improve the bot, integrate new tools, and provide a powerful, flexible tool for medium to large Discord servers.
